Hmm the CIs seem to fail on the test `TestCut.test_single_quantile`; however, this test passes on my local environment...

```
(pandas-dev) mroeschke@MR-ThinkPad:/mnt/c/Users/Matt Roeschke/Projects/pandas-mroeschke$ pytest pandas/tests/reshape/test_tile.py::TestCut::test_single_quantile
========================================================================== test session starts ==========================================================================

rootdir: /mnt/c/Users/Matt Roeschke/Projects/pandas-mroeschke, inifile: setup.cfg
plugins: xdist-1.20.1, forked-0.2, cov-2.5.1, hypothesis-3.38.5
collected 1 item

pandas/tests/reshape/test_tile.py .                                                                                                                               [100%]

======================================================================= 1 passed in 0.49 seconds ========================================================================
```
those builds are for older numpy versions
